creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: light green shoe body with side lining only (a--blue; b--black); and bound black open edge; uptruned toe and floral lined heel flap; satin stitch floral design embroidered on sides and front in pinks, greens, orange; reinforced soles (paper and fabric), stitched throughout with heavy cord
title: Pair of Shoes
